languages.text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.
languages.original_text: Многочисленные ценности и трофеи небрежно свалены в единую груду. Кто бы не сложил их здесь, вряд ли им придавалось сколько-то серьезное значение.

traits.locale_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.
Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.
Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

languages.text: Многочисленные ценности и трофеи небрежно свалены в единую груду. Кто бы не сложил их здесь, вряд ли им придавалось сколько-то серьезное значение.
无数贵重的物品与战利品被人漫不经心地堆在一起。虽然不知道是什么人把它们堆在了这里，但那个人显然并没有认真留意过这些东西。
languages.original_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

traits.locale_text: 无数贵重的物品与战利品被人漫不经心地堆在一起。虽然不知道是什么人把它们堆在了这里，但那个人显然并没有认真留意过这些东西。

languages.text: Han apilado un gran número de objetos valiosos y trofeos. Parece que quien los dejara ahí no los consideraba importantes.
languages.original_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

traits.locale_text: Han apilado un gran número de objetos valiosos y trofeos. Parece que quien los dejara ahí no los consideraba importantes.

languages.text: 数多くの貴重品やトロフィーが無造作に山積みにされている。ここに置いた人は、これらの品々について真剣に考えることはなかったようだ。
languages.original_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

traits.locale_text: 数多くの貴重品やトロフィーが無造作に山積みにされている。これをやった人は一つひとつのアイテムについて真剣に考えることはなかったようだ。
数多くの貴重品やトロフィーが無造作に山積みにされている。ここに置いた人は、これらの品々について真剣に考えることはなかったようだ。

languages.text: Un tas formé de nombreux objets précieux et autres trophées. Quelqu'un les a jetés négligemment ici sans le moindre égard pour leur valeur.
languages.original_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

traits.locale_text: Un tas formé de nombreux objets précieux et autres trophées. Quelqu'un les a jetés négligemment ici sans le moindre égard pour leur valeur.

languages.text: Diverse Wertgegenstände und Trophäen wurden achtlos auf einen Haufen geworfen. Wer immer das getan hat, hatte wohl keine sonderliche Wertschätzung dafür.
languages.original_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

traits.locale_text: Diverse Wertgegenstände und Trophäen wurden achtlos auf einen Haufen geworfen. Wer immer das getan hat, hatte wohl keine sonderliche Wertschätzung dafür.

languages.text: Sayısız değerli eşya ve ganimet umursamazca üst üste yığılmış. Bu yığının mimarı her kimse belli ki elindekilerin kıymetini bilmiyor.
languages.original_text: Numerous valuables and trophies are carelessly dumped into a single pile. It seems whoever put them here did not give these items any serious thought.

traits.locale_text: Sayısız değerli eşya ve ganimet umursamazca üst üste yığılmış. Bu yığının mimarı her kimse belli ki elindekilerin kıymetini bilmiyor.
